item.Q:
Write the character: kān
(bàokān de kān)
item.A:
to print; publish
报刊 (報刊) bàokān newspapers and periodicals; the press

traditional: 靜默
jìngmò silence; to stand in silence (in mourning)

traditional: 默許
mòxǔ to consent tacitly

traditional: 默認
mòrèn to agree tacitly; tacit approval; default (setting)
mòmò in silence; not speaking
nǚláng girl
xīnláng bridegroom
fǎláng franc
pèngqiǎo by chance; by coincidence; to happen to

traditional: 碰見
pèngjiàn to run into; to meet (unexpectedly); to bump into

traditional: 碰頭
pèngtóu to knock heads
bùjīn can't help (doing sth); can't refrain from

traditional: 嚴禁
yánjìn strictly prohibit
qíngbùzìjìn unable to restrain emotions; cannot help
chájìn to prohibit; to ban; to suprress
hǎijìn prohibition on entering or leaving by sea
jìnlìng prohibition; ban

traditional: 禁區
jìnqū restricted area; forbidden region

traditional: 禁欲主義
jīnyùzhǔyì asceticism
jìnzhǐ to prohibit

traditional: 禁軍
jìnjūn imperial guard

traditional: 禁運
jìnyùn embargo; export ban (e.g. on weapons)
jīnyùn embargo
gōngpó husband's parents; parents-in-law
wàipó (informal) mother's mother; maternal grandmother
pópo husband's mother; mother-in-law
pójia husband's family

traditional: 婆羅門
póluómén Brahman
xiǎolǎopó concubine; junior wife
lǎotàipó old woman (often contemptuous); one's own wife
lǎopó (informal) wife
lǎopópó grannie

traditional: 優先股
yōuxiāngǔ preferred stock
bāgǔ an essay in eight parts; stereotyped writing
hégǔ joint stock; ply (e.g. 2-ply yarn)
gǔfèn a share (in a company); stock
gǔfēnyǒuxiàngōngsī public corporation
gǔxī dividend
gǔběn (n) capital stock

traditional: 股東
gǔdōng stockholder
gǔpiào share; stock (market)

traditional: 抽動
chōudòng (v) twitch
chōudǎ strap
chōuchá a spot check (e.g. for drugs)

traditional: 抽樣
chōuyàng sample; sampling
chōushuǐ unwatering

traditional: 抽水機
chōushuǐjī water pump
chōukòng to find the time to do sth

traditional: 抽簽
chōuqiān to draw lots
chōuxiàng abstract
kěhèn hateful
hènbude one would if one could; itch to

traditional: 懷恨
huáihèn to nurse hatred
tònghèn abhor

traditional: 遺恨
yíhèn grudge

zhòngkěn pertinent; apropos
zhōngkěn cogency
kěndìng to be sure; to be certain; sure; certain; definite; to confirm; to affirm; affirmative

traditional: 肯尼亞
Kěnníyà Kenya
kěnníyà Kenya
kānwù publication
kāndēng carry a story; publish (in a newspaper or magazine)

traditional: 刊載
kānzǎi to publish

traditional: 創刊
chuàngkān to start publishing; to found a journal

traditional: 創刊號
chuàngkānhào first issue
bànyuèkān fortnightly; twice a month
zhōukān weekly publication

traditional: 報刊
bàokān newspapers and periodicals; the press
niánkān annual
rìkān daily (publication)

traditional: 書刊
shūkān books and publications
yuèkān monthly magazine
qīkān periodical
